name: Camp Confidential Quiz | Kid Lit Authors L - Z | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who has a brother named Adam and a sister named Stephanie?
questions.explanation:
Jenna.

	Jenna's last name is Bloom.

Alex.

	Alex loves to play soccer.

questions.text: Who is the snotty girl in bunk 3C?
questions.explanation:
Chelsea.

	Chelsea's best friend is Karen.

questions.text: Who wants to be an actress?
questions.explanation:
Brynn.

	Brynn's best friend is Alex.

questions.text: Who had to read the book "Call of the Wild"?
questions.explanation:
Grace.

	Grace's best friend was a girl from bunk 3A, until Grace found out she was a bully.

Natalie.

	Natalie's last name is Goode.

questions.text: Which CIT is Stephanie's best friend?

questions.explanation:
Adam.

	Adam is Jenna's twin brother.

questions.text: Who does Grace have a crush on?
questions.explanation:
Devon.

	Natalie has a crush on Simon.

questions.text: Who is the shy girl in bunk 3A?
questions.explanation:
Christa.

	Karen is the shy girl in bunk 3C.
